title: My game takes forever to load in for champion select
body: This happened to me recently,when i am in champion select there would be like a black scence for around 40 sec for every mode. Is there anyways that i can solve this problem.

replies.body: I have been experiencing this for the past 5 days ever since the patch 7.4 update. I use a mac book air, and it seems every patch one needs to be ready for a certain bug. I was able to solve mine immediately by just playing on the legacy client. I do not experience the champ select blackout or having to wait 1 min to return to game menu just after you finish a game on the legacy client. Tbh, you might as well run on the legacy client till the 7.5 patch update if you are looking for a beta client solution to your problem. Counting on the tech guys at riot to help you is like pouring water into a basket. it took them almost 3 months to fix the sound issues and fps drop mac users were experiencing from patch 6.5 - 6.7. Thousands of ranked games were lost due to their negligence.

Is this happening in the Beta Client or the Legacy Client? If you're using the Beta Client, try enabling *Low-spec mode* and disable *Animation*. 

http://image.prntscr.com/image/598e949fe2904c85b3220875cf13760f.png

Please let me know if this caused any impact to your symptoms.
